project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to get a filename to read in the file contents using an fread operation within the function Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C476A-SUBV-03-ST02-DT07-DF17-CF01-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: create a repository Reads file name of a csv containing 3, fully quoted, comma separated, columns.Opens file and reads each value and sets it to index in array. If a value isn'tfully quoted program will skip that value and eventually seg fault when dereferencingarray index for printing

iopair.description: commit a file Reads file name of a csv containing 3, fully quoted, comma separated, columns.Opens file and reads each value and sets it to index in array. If a value isn'tfully quoted program will skip that value and eventually seg fault when dereferencingarray index for printing

process.script: cd ../good-02 && cp file.txt stonesoup && cd stonesoup && $SS_TC_DEPS/bin/svn add file.txt

scoring_formula.formula: CHECKOUT AND ADD AND COMMIT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
